song.title: Hexplosion!
song.info:
2nd in the Revision 2017 executable music compo ---
[b]Aceman's coments:[/b]
"Hexplosion!" by AceMan / Dreamweb
HivelyTracker tune written for Revision Newschool Exe Music Compo :)
This will be the title track for my upcoming digital album, which I also plan to release as low-quantity edition CD.
The album will be a compilation of my (IMO) best AHX/HVL tunes.
Replayer: Xeron / IRIS Putting everything together: Blackwine / Dreamweb Packed with UPX.
--
Hey, why don't you visit:
http://www.modules.pl http://www.JuicyCube.net http://JuicyCube.bandcamp.com
